property_description:
This organic estate with two 180 m² houses is located on a majestic 40,000 m² plot high up on the mountain
and offers a natural retreat surrounded by stunning scenery. A small river with crystal clear water flows on one side of the property, providing a tranquil and fertile environment. The land consists of several terraces, carefully landscaped to optimize organic farming and take advantage of the natural topography.

The heart of the estate are two main houses, built with a sustainable approach and ecological materials, combining modern comfort with a rustic and natural style. In addition, two bioclimatic buildings complement the houses, designed to provide maximum energy efficiency and comfort in all seasons. The entire estate is completely powered by solar energy, ensuring a self-sufficient and eco-friendly lifestyle.

The farm is characterized by its commitment to organic farming, with a wide variety of medicinal plants cultivated for the production of tinctures and medicinal oils. In addition, several liters of high-quality organic oil are produced, as well as a wide variety of organically grown fruits, suitable for both home consumption and sale. The large, well-designed organic garden provides fresh, nutritious vegetables all year round, with a completely chemical-free cultivation system. As part of the added value, the property includes three caravans that integrate perfectly into the natural environment and offer additional accommodation for guests or to expand the agricultural project. This ecological oasis combines sustainable living, high-quality agricultural production and an incomparable natural environment, ideal for those who want to live in harmony with nature and enjoy a self-sufficient lifestyle. This farm is the perfect place for those looking for a refuge in nature
and in harmony with nature, with all the comforts to live an ecological and sustainable life in the countryside and in addition, if you want, earn money from production . If you want to know everything, we will be happy to arrange a visit for you and you will see, you will be amazed by its beauty.

property_description:
Charming Multi-Level Property with Panoramic Mountain Views in Tolox

Nestled in the hills of Tolox, within the stunning Sierra de las Nieves Natural Park, this unique property offers a blend of tranquillity, space, and versatility.
Located in a quiet residential area just a 5-minute walk from the centre of the village, this home boasts breathtaking views, sunny terraces, and flexible living spaces — ideal for full-time residence, a holiday retreat, or a creative investment opportunity.

Property Features:
Location: Peaceful hillside setting with mountain views, near Tolox town centre
Orientation: South-facing with sunshine all day
Outdoor Spaces: Multiple terraces with fruit trees, BBQ area, and panoramic views, perfect for entertaining
Living Space: Flexible multi-level layout with potential for expansion or rental income
Wellness Features: Includes a private sauna and gym and access to Tolox’s renowned spa waters

Layout:

Lower Level / Basement
Currently utilised as a storeroom/workshop/home gym/sauna area, this spacious lower level presents numerous possibilities. With an independent entrance this could easily be transformed into a self-contained apartment, guest suite, or even converted back to a garage.
First Floor
• Bright and airy open plan living area
• Modern toilet with utility area
• Fully fitted kitchen
• Dining area
• Rear terrace with lush greenery, ideal for outdoor dining or morning coffee

Second Floor
• Main bedroom with en-suite and private terrace overlooking the front of the house
• Double bedroom
• Flexible-use room currently used as a workshop/study (could be a third bedroom)
• Family bathroom

Top Floor / Rooftop
• Dedicated work space or study
• Expansive roof terrace perfect for entertaining, with:
• Built-in BBQ
• Seating areas
• Small fruit trees (mango, cherry, grapefruit, lemon)
• Thriving strawberry and tomato plants
• Spectacular panoramic views of the Sierra de las Nieves mountains

Location & Lifestyle
Just a short stroll away lies the charming village of Tolox, known for its traditional Andalusian charm and famous open-air spa, which dates back to Roman times. The spa’s thermal, mineral-rich waters are known for their healing properties, offering a unique wellness experience unlike anywhere else in the region.
Tolox offers something truly special for nature lovers and hikers alike — the Waterfall Walk. Known locally for its rugged beauty, cascading waterfalls, and pristine mountain air, this trail is a favourite among walkers seeking both tranquillity and a touch of adventure.
The town is also a gateway to nature lovers, hikers, and wellness seekers, thanks to its proximity to the Sierra de las Nieves National Park, a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve.

Summary:
This property offers more than just a home — it provides a lifestyle of peace, nature, wellness, and potential. Whether you are dreaming of a mountain-view retreat, a work-from-home sanctuary, or a property with flexible rental options, this residence ticks all the boxes.
Viewings highly recommended to appreciate the charm, space, and endless possibilities this property offers.

property_description:
307.000€ – Stylish 3-Bedroom Townhouse in Playa Paraíso | Frontline Beach Living

This charming 3-bedroom townhouse is perfectly located in a beachfront complex in Playa Paraíso, just a few steps from the sand and sea.
Spanning four levels, the home is thoughtfully designed to combine comfort, space, and the relaxed elegance of Mediterranean living.

At the entrance, a private garden and covered terrace provide the perfect spot to unwind or entertain outdoors. Inside, the open-plan layout features a bright lounge area and a fully equipped kitchen, creating a warm and inviting living space.

A spiral staircase leads down to the basement with its own bathroom, which could be used as a 4th bedroom—ideal for friends or family.
On the next level, you'll find the main bedroom, a second smaller bedroom, and a bathroom with a walk-in shower.

The top floor offers a third bedroom with access to a private terrace, a peaceful retreat to enjoy the sea breeze and sunshine.

The gated complex offers a tranquil and secure environment with beautifully maintained gardens, a heated swimming pool, and direct access to the beach. You'll also enjoy being within walking distance of shops, restaurants, and cafés, with the bustling marina of La Duquesa just a short drive away, offering more dining, leisure, and lifestyle options.

Whether you're searching for a full-time home, a relaxing holiday getaway, or a smart rental investment, this townhouse offers an unbeatable opportunity in one of the Costa del Sol’s most desirable seaside locations.

Don’t miss your chance to experience beachfront living at its best in Playa Paraíso. Contact us today to arrange a viewing.

On the entrance floor, you find a comfortable living room with a cozy fireplace, along with a kitchen and the dining area. There is also a guest toilet. Upstairs, there are two bright double bedrooms, one of which boasts stunning sea views and a charming French balcony. Both bedrooms share a bathroom. In front of the house, you have a spacious 17 sqm terrace, surrounded by beautiful flowers. It is the perfect corner to enjoy sunny days looking out over the sea

The property benefits from a tourist license, allowing excellent rental income potential. It is a prime location, within walking distance of supermarkets, shops, restaurants, cafés and ensures strong demand for holiday rentals. This is a good opportunity for both private residential and investment, offering a ready-to-rent property in one of the popular locations on Costa del Sol.

Welcome to book your viewing with us!

From the patio, you can access a generous rooftop terrace — the perfect spot to create your own chill-out zone, install a jacuzzi, or even expand the property. It already has a building license, giving you the opportunity to increase its value and possibilities.

The best part? Homes like this — beautifully renovated, full of character, and with so much potential — are incredibly rare in this location… and when they do appear, they don’t stay on the market for long.

Stylish 3-Bedroom Townhouse in the Heart of Alhaurín Golf

Discover this charming three-bedroom townhouse set within the sought-after Alhaurín Golf urbanisation, home to a prestigious 18-hole golf course and a welcoming clubhouse. Perfectly positioned, the property is just a short stroll from a variety of local bars and restaurants, offering both convenience and lifestyle.

Step inside to a welcoming entrance hall leading to a guest WC, a fully fitted kitchen, and a separate utility room. The spacious open-plan lounge and dining area flows seamlessly onto a private garden — ideal for alfresco dining or relaxing in the sun.

Upstairs, the home offers two generous double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes — one of which opens onto a quaint private terrace — a family bathroom, and a spacious master suite complete with fitted wardrobes, an en-suite bathroom, and direct access to an open terrace with views.

Residents enjoy access to a gated communal swimming pool — the perfect spot to cool off during warm summer days. Additional features include hot and cold air conditioning, double glazing, marble flooring, and allocated open parking.

Conveniently located, the charming towns of Coín and Alhaurín el Grande are just a 10-minute drive away, while the beautiful beaches of the Costa del Sol can be reached in just 20 minutes.

Whether you’re seeking a holiday retreat or a permanent home, this property offers the perfect blend of comfort, location, and lifestyle.

property_description:
339.000€ Stunning 3-Bedroom Townhouse in Playa Paraiso - Front Line Beach Complex. Turistic License in place!

This beautiful townhouse, located in playa Paraiso, offers the perfect blend of comfort and coastal charm. Set within a front-line beach complex, this home spans four floors, with a spacious bedroom on each level, ensuring privacy and tranquility for every resident.

Starting with its own private garden and covered terrace—perfect for outdoor relaxation. As you enter, the first floor boasts a spacious open-plan kitchen that flows effortlessly into the sitting room, providing a seamless indoor-outdoor living experience. A private door from the kitchen offers direct access to your covered parking space, a rare and valuable feature in Playa Paraiso, where only a select few homes have their own dedicated parking.

The bedrooms are generously sized and thoughtfully distributed across the floors. On the -1 floor, you'll find one en-suite bedroom, while the other two bedrooms on 2nd & 3rd floor share a bathroom. These two bedrooms have their own private terraces. The property also includes a storage room in the basement with natural light from windows, offering additional space for your belongings.

For those seeking further potential, there is the exciting opportunity to create your own access to the basement from the garden, allowing you to transform it into an independent apartment—perfect for guests, rental income, or additional living space. This property truly offers the best of both practicality and possibility.

Just a minute's walk away, you'll find yourself on the golden sands of the beach, ready to enjoy the crystal-clear waters and stunning coastal views.

The gated community is designed for both security and enjoyment, featuring a heated swimming pool, pristine landscaped gardens, direct access to the beach, all within easy reach of local amenities. Proximity to the beach is an undeniable advantage, offering daily opportunities for beachside relaxation, watersports, or coastal walks. Additionally, nearby restaurants, shops, and cafes enhance the living experience, while the vibrant marina of La Duquesa is only a short drive away, offering a variety of leisure and dining options.

This townhouse is an exceptional opportunity for holiday living, a seasonal rental investment, or a full-time residence, given its features and desirable location in the Costa del Sol. Its low-maintenance design, secure environment, and the luxury of a heated pool make it an excellent choice for those looking to embrace the relaxed yet vibrant lifestyle that La Duquesa has to offer.

Whether you're relaxing in one of the generously sized bedrooms, enjoying the proximity to the beach, or taking advantage of the nearby amenities, this townhouse offers an exceptional lifestyle. Don't miss the chance to own this beautiful beachside retreat in Playa Paraiso!

For full details and to explore more about this exceptional property arrange an appointment or contact us.
Playa Paraiso is a genuine location by the beach, plenty of garden, community heated pool and where you can enjoy the Spanish sunshine more that 300 days a year!

property_description:
Nestled in the peaceful countryside northwest of Coín, just a 12-minute drive (6.5 km) from the village, this versatile country property offers a fantastic opportunity for those seeking privacy, space, and investment potential. The property currently comprises two independent semi-detached single-storey houses, each with its own separate entrance. Both homes feature 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a living room with fireplace, and a kitchen, making them ideal for extended families, guests, or rental income. One of the homes also benefits from air conditioning.

Each house has its own private terrace with a barbecue area, perfect for enjoying the tran-quil surroundings and beautiful mountain views. The plot, measuring just under 3,000m², is distributed across two flat, fenced terraces, offering plenty of space for outdoor activi-ties, gardening, or even keeping a horse.

The property boasts a total built size of 327m², which includes spacious porches and storage rooms, with 130m² of internal living space between the two houses. Built in 2001, the property is fully registered and comes with the AFO certificate already in place.


Additional features include:

• Excellent road access

• Two private wells for domestic water supply

• Irrigation water access for the land (running between May to October)

• Independent vehicle access for each house


While modernization is required, the property offers enormous potential, whether you choose to live in one house and rent the other, run a rural tourism project, or simply create a spacious family home in an idyllic setting.

With a bit of imagination and care, this could become a truly special retreat in the Andalusian countryside.

Charming 3-Bedroom Townhouse in Casares Playa – Prime Location with Potential

Situated in the heart of the sought-after coastal enclave of Casares Playa, this 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom townhouse offers an enviable lifestyle just a short stroll from the golden sands and the lively town of Sabinillas. Both bathrooms feature walk-in showers, enhancing everyday convenience.

Inside, the home exudes warmth and character, with a cozy fireplace anchoring the living area—perfect for relaxed evenings or hosting guests. While the property retains a classic charm, it offers an exciting opportunity for modernisation to suit contemporary tastes and enhance its full potential.

A generous roof terrace crowns the home, ideal for alfresco dining or quiet sunset moments. There's also a built-in barbecue area and a handy storage space, adding to the functionality of the outdoor space. Air conditioning ensures comfort throughout the warmer months, while a private patio offers a peaceful retreat in the open air.

With its unbeatable location, this townhouse presents a wonderful canvas for those looking to create a stylish coastal residence—be it for year-round living or as a holiday escape.

property_description:
Charming semi detached townhouse situated in Valle Verde.

Located within the renowned Mijas Golf resort, adjacent to the golf course, the pretty urbanisation is adorned with fruit trees and manicured gardens. The well maintained community offers a large community pool, plus ample, gated parking with security cameras.

Distributed over various split levels this unique property is full of character and maintains the rustic Andalusian charm throughout, creating a very welcoming private home.

On entering the townhouse to the left you find a cloakroom, followed by a fully fitted kitchen with natural light from the front of the property and an opening hatch into the dining room below. Steps lead down to the dining space which features a unique central atrium where natural light beams down though windows from the upper levels. The dining area overlooks the cosy living room which is positioned on a slightly lower level. The room features an open fireplace for those cosy winter evenings. The area is full of natural light thanks to the large patio doors, opening out to a good sized private terrace which is a great space for al-fresco dining.

From the entrance level, steps lead up to the master bedroom on the first floor, a good sized room with ample fitted wardrobes and full of natural light, with views over the communal gardens. Further up through the property you find a further 2 double bedrooms one of which is dual aspect. All bedrooms have ample storage and are equipped with air conditioning. Half way up the stairwell you gain access to a second good sized, private terrace with great county and garden views. A perfect setting to sunbathe with privacy and enjoy the warm mediterranean evenings and sunsets.

The tranquil area is easily accessible. Within a 10 minute drive you have the bustling town and sweeping coastline of Fuengirola. Alternatively within a short drive you have the pretty and increasingly popular coastal town of to La Cala de Mijas. Malaga international airport is just 25 minutes away. There are local amenities… restaurants, convenience stores, a vet, sports centre etc. just a few minutes away and it is just a short walk to public transport and a large park.


A lovely home full of Andalusian charm with ample space for all the family to enjoy… in an ideal location, appealing to both golf enthusiasts and families.

Contact us now to arrange viewings.

property_description:
Just 10 minutes from the town of Alhaurín El Grande, accessible via a concrete road, this charming recently renovated semi-detached country house offers a peaceful living environment with breathtaking views and optimal sunlight.

The main living area features an open plan kitchen leading to a cosy living room with a fireplace, a glass-enclosed terrace used as a dining and sitting area, as well as a spacious bedroom with a walk-in closet, directly connected to a large bathroom. A second completely independent bedroom, with its own entrance and private bathroom, is a real asset for hosting guests or for offering rental opportunities.

At the entrance of the property, a covered parking area provides convenient parking, while two fully equipped caravans offer additional living space, each with a kitchen, dining area, bedroom, bathroom, and private terrace, perfect for welcoming family and friends. The more than 6,000m² of fertile land is planted with numerous fruit trees, including orange, lemon, and loquat, and is divided into two sections by a path. The second plot is planted with beautiful olive trees. For added convenience, the property is equipped with town water, canal water, and a shared water well, ensuring ample irrigation. Several storage areas complete the property.

This true haven of peace, where only the sound of birdsong will disturb your tranquillity, is the perfect place to enjoy spectacular sunsets and immerse yourself in a privileged natural setting. A rare opportunity, ideal as a primary or secondary residence, or for a B&B project. This house has an AFO in place. A must-see!

property_description:
Located just 1 kilometre from the iconic Puerto Banús, this three-level, Southwest orientated, corner, 1 bedroom townhouse is perfect as a Marbella base. This is a fantastic opportunity at a competitive price. Upon entering the property, you’ll find a cosy, bright, neat and cool living area with fitted kitchen that flows to a charming outdoor dining terrace, a shaded space adjacent to the gardens and community pool. Upstairs, your spacious and bright double bedroom awaits with a small terrace and private ensuite bedroom. The upper level also features a rooftop terrace with all day sunshine and impressive views of the community, surrounding landscape with the La Concha Mountain as your skyline backdrop. Benefiting from its corner position the property is airy, light, offers multiple terraces and serene garden and pool views providing the perfect combination of peace and convenience. The complex itself is a tranquil oasis, built in the style of a traditional Andalusian-Moorish pueblo and is full of charm. Featuring beautifully landscaped gardens and communal pool. Positioned in the community of Atalaya de Rio Verde, it is surrounded by palatial mansions. Just a short stroll from the lively Aloha area with its popular bars and restaurants (7 mins), and within walking distance of Puerto Banús and the beach (20 mins), this home perfectly combines comfort, and convenience. The Golden Mile stretches 8 km from Puerto Banus to Marbella. There is also a boardwalk that stretches 2.5 km from Puerto Banus to San Pedro.

property_description:
Beautifully Maintained Country House with Stunning Views – Almogía
Discover this charming and well-kept country home – 131m2, located in the peaceful urbanisation Fuente Amarga in Almogía. Set in a tranquil area, this property offers breathtaking views across the rolling Andalusian countryside – a true retreat in nature.
Situated on a fully fenced plot of 3,029 m², the property includes an automatic irrigation system, making it easy to maintain and full of potential for further development.
Outdoor Space & Potential
At the front, you'll find a beautifully landscaped garden, while the flat garden at the rear of the house offers exciting possibilities – ideal for adding glamping tents or a casa móvil, perfect for tourism or additional guest accommodation.
Swimming Pool & Relaxation Area
The private 8x4 meter pool has been recently renovated with a new liner. Around the pool is a spacious sun terrace, offering plenty of room to relax and soak up the sun.
Interior Layout
• Gated entrance
• 2 comfortable bedrooms
• 1 fully equipped bathroom
• Spacious and bright living room
• Cozy veranda overlooking the pool
• Additional room currently used for storage, easily convertible into a guest apartment
• Smal storage room
Fully Updated Infrastructure
All underground pipes, the electrical system, and the septic tank have been recently renewed – ensuring peace of mind and low maintenance.
Water Supply
The property is connected to the mains water supply and also features a separate system for using collected rainwater inside the house – a great eco-friendly bonus.
This beautiful country house is not only perfect for permanent living but also an ideal opportunity for holiday rentals, thanks to its central location and the popularity of the Almogía region. An excellent investment in one of Andalusia’s hidden gems.

For sale, a charming corner house that exudes the allure of traditional popular architecture in Málaga. This property is located in the Molinillo neighborhood, in the central district of Málaga. It's just a 10-minute walk from the historic center, brimming with local services and commerce, allowing you to feel at home while being close to the vibrant tourist area.

The area's main attraction is the Salamanca Market, a Mudéjar-style building known for its unique and widely recognized architecture. The house is spread over two floors and boasts two facades that provide ample natural light. The facade stands out with its vibrant colors, elegant cornices, and curved wooden windows. We are also captivated by the generous ceiling height on both the ground floor and the first floor, as well as the exposed wooden beams that add a special charm.

The current layout of the house includes an entrance hall on the ground floor, with an old garage on one side, converted into a room or lounge, and a bedroom on the other. Moving to the rear of the property, you'll find a kitchen and a patio with a laundry area. Additionally, there's a convenient bathroom on this floor. A beautiful staircase, adorned with Andalusian-style tiles and centrally located, leads to a well-lit upper floor with sloping wooden ceilings and curved wooden windows throughout. Here, you'll discover two bedrooms and a spacious bathroom.

The property is sold with a project of adding a roof terrace to the rear of the property. If you need more information about expansion possibilities, please don't hesitate to ask. As an added bonus, the price includes 1 parking space in the basement of a building on the same street.

Whether you're looking for a new home in Málaga or an investment with high income potential, this property is your best choice. Feel free to contact us for more details and to schedule a visit. This opportunity should not be overlooked.

property_description:
Located in a quiet and well-maintained urbanization next to Sierra Chica, directly opposite the popular La Trocha shopping center, this beautifully presented townhouse enjoys a prime, south-facing position with truly spectacular mountain views. The property is spread over three generous levels. On the ground floor, you’ll find an excep-tionally spacious double garage with impressive double-height ceilings, offering potential to add a mezzanine level for additional storage or workspace.

A staircase leads to the main living area, featuring an open-plan, fully fitted kitchen and a bright living-dining room with direct access to a private terrace, perfect for enjoying the views. This level also includes a modern bathroom with walk-in shower and a separate utili-ty room.

Upstairs, there are three double bedrooms, one currently used as an office, and two stylish bathrooms. The home is in outstanding condition, meticulously maintained by its current owner, and ready to move into without the need for any work.

Additional features include underfloor heating in the bathrooms, air conditioning through-out most of the property, and a second entrance via a pedestrian gate at the rear. The town-house is part of a secure gated community with added security, two swimming pools, and well-kept communal gardens. Community fees are just €73 per month.

This is a fantastic opportunity to own a turnkey home in a highly desirable area, combining comfort, space, and unbeatable views.

The back garden of the house is lovely and has nice windy paths and space to grow flowers or grow your own vegetables. And plenty of space to grow fruit trees.

In short, its a perfect full time living home, 2nd home or investment property.

While the property enjoys privacy and a rural setting, it remains close enough to the town for easy access to amenities. It has electricity and a legal well, though the well currently requires deepening to restore water access. One side of the main house will need renovation due to some minor cracking, but this provides an opportunity to customize the space.

With its expansive land, peaceful surroundings, and proximity to town, this estate offers a rare opportunity for those seeking a charming rural lifestyle with modern conveniences.

property_description:
Tucked into the serene Andalusian countryside, this beautifully presented traditional country home offers the perfect blend of rustic charm and modern comfort. With spectacular panoramic views and some of the most breathtaking sunsets imaginable, the property is ideally situated just off a tarmac road, a short 1.3 km from the charming hamlet of Pastelero. There you’ll find two popular restaurants and a bakery with daily essentials – an easy stroll away if you're up for a walk back uphill.
This versatile property has been thoughtfully adapted to accommodate a variety of lifestyles. Whether you’re seeking a spacious multi-generational family home, a retreat for visiting friends, or an income-generating tourist accommodation, the flexible layout and self-contained living spaces make almost anything possible. In total, there are six bedrooms, five bathrooms and two kitchens, creating distinct areas that can function entirely independently. It’s a dream opportunity for anyone interested in rural tourism or simply in need of space and privacy.
The main residence consists of three bedrooms and two bathrooms, with a warm, inviting feel throughout. The heart of the home is the country style kitchen, fully fitted with quality hardwood cabinetry, granite worktops, and a large gas stove with oven. There’s a generous dining room with space for eight, a cozy sitting room with wood-burning stove, and charming traditional features throughout. All major rooms are equipped with air conditioning, and the house is connected to mains water and electricity, with broadband internet and a modern 3-chamber septic tank.
The home’s annex, seamlessly connected to the main house yet entirely private, offers a large double bedroom, living/dining room with wood burner (now in use as a bedroom), new bathroom and an extra bathroom area that needs some renovation. There is a west-facing terrace with uninterrupted views – perfect for evening relaxation. With its own entrance and a lockable internal door to the main home, this annex is ideal for family or guests seeking independence or could easily be rented out for tourism.
Beneath the main house lies another fully self-contained one-bedroom apartment with its own kitchen, living and dining space, shower room, and direct access to a private terrace with lush countryside views.
The property includes a range of useful outbuildings: storage sheds, a wood store, and a utility room. There's ample parking space, including a concrete base ideal for a camper van or trailer. A rare loft space provides even more storage, ideal for seasonal items. There is also an above ground swimming pool, ideal for staying cool during the summer months.
The plot of 1,500m² features lovingly maintained gardens filled with mature trees and shrubs. A large, gated courtyard connects the main living spaces and outbuildings, offering the ideal setting for alfresco dining or lounging. One of the property’s most unique features is the preserved Era – a traditional threshing circle – now serving as a dramatic space for laundry drying with one of the best views in the region.
Located just 10 minutes from the thriving village of Villanueva de la Concepción, the home offers easy access to a range of services including supermarkets, restaurants, a 24-hour health centre, schools, sports facilities, and a public swimming pool. El Torcal Natural Park and El Chorro’s famous Caminito del Rey are nearby, offering unparalleled hiking and natural beauty.
This is a rare opportunity to own a beautifully maintained, flexible home in a sought-after rural location that offers income potential, tranquility, and authentic Andalusian charm. This is more than a home – it's a lifestyle waiting to be embraced.

This charming property features a spacious 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom house with two levels, located in the peaceful Barranco del Sol neighborhood. The house is well-maintained and offers a range of desirable amenities, including access to city water and electricity, as well as a 3000-liter water tank for backup.

The living area is bright and inviting, with a cozy sitting area, dining space, and a charming stove and fireplace to create a warm atmosphere. The fully equipped kitchen includes a stove, dishwasher, and two refrigerators, with a door leading directly outside for easy access to the outdoors.

The bathroom is fitted with a bath, shower, sink, and toilet, providing a comfortable and functional space. There is no air conditioning in the living room, but the upstairs bedrooms are equipped with air conditioning for added comfort.

Outside, you'll find a covered terrace, perfect for both winter and summer use. There's a door leading to the garden, where you'll discover the inviting pool area, along with a shower next to the pool for convenience. The master bedroom has its own private terrace with a door leading to the garden, offering stunning views.

Upstairs, two additional bedrooms each have their own terraces, offering beautiful views of the valley and the pool area. The second bedroom has direct views of the pool. Additionally, there's a laundry room and a storage area for extra convenience.

The property is easily accessible, with a 200-meter driveway and a stream running along the property, enhancing the natural charm. The municipality is also planning to repair the road for improved access.

This property offers ample parking space and is located in a tranquil area with easy access to nearby amenities. It's an ideal home for those looking for a peaceful retreat with beautiful views and plenty of space.

property_description:
Spacious 7-Bedroom Townhouse with Garage, Garden, Wine Cellar & Panoramic Roof Terrace in Guaro Village.

Nestled in the charming village of Guaro, this expansive three-level townhouse offers over 300m² of living space, making it a perfect option for large families, those seeking multi-generational living, or even a boutique rural guesthouse project.

The ground floor features a huge private garage with space for up to three vehicles, as well as a wine cellar. From the entrance, a staircase leads up to the main living areas.

On the first floor, you’ll find a spacious main lounge and dining area complete with a fireplace, a double bedroom, family bathroom, and a large, fully fitted kitchen. The kitchen opens onto a private patio, which offers independent access to the street and leads to a rear terraced garden, ideal for outdoor dining, gardening, or relaxing in the sun.

The second level hosts five generously sized double bedrooms and a second bathroom, while the top level features an additional room that opens onto a large rooftop terrace with stunning panoramic views over the countryside and village, perfect for sunset evenings or morning coffee with a view.

Comfort is ensured year-round with oil central heating and air conditioning, and the property boasts easy access to the main road, making it convenient for commuting or exploring the surrounding region.

This unique property blends traditional village charm with substantial indoor and outdoor space, perfect as a family home, guesthouse, or countryside retreat with excellent potential.

property_description:

This property, renovated in 2004, stands out for its privileged location, surrounded by all kinds of amenities within walking distance, including the famous Calle San Miguel and the train station, just five minutes away. The house is on one floor, which makes it easily accessible and suitable for people with reduced mobility.

The house has three spacious bedrooms and a full bathroom, distributed over a built area of 65 m². The living room is bright and comfortable, with individual air conditioning units and direct access to a 30 m² private terrace, ideal for enjoying the Costa del Sol climate. In addition, it has a spectacular 65 m² private solarium terrace with urban views and the possibility of building up to three additional floors, which adds great potential for expansion.

It does not have a garage, but its excellent location compensates for this with its proximity to shops, restaurants, children's play areas, schools and all kinds of public transport.

This house is ideal both as a primary residence and as an investment, given its proximity to the centre, services and the main attractions of Torremolinos. A unique opportunity for those seeking comfort, outdoor space and growth potential in one of the most sought-after areas of the Costa del Sol.

Exceptional Opportunity: Private Country House with Spacious Garden Plot

This country house, set on a generous 2,500m² plot in Las Alberdinas, is a rare find for those seeking both seclusion and convenience. Offering a unique blend of privacy and accessibility, this property is a true gem. Nestled in a quiet, private setting away from the hustle and bustle, it provides a peaceful retreat, yet remains just a short drive from everything you need.

The house is great size, easy to maintain and make your own. Electricity from the grid and water from a private well.
The living room features air conditioning, ensuring comfort during the warmer months.

The expansive garden is a true highlight, with a variety of mature fruit trees such as avocado, mango, papaya, lemon, orange, figs, and grapevines. This lush landscape not only adds to the charm of the property but also offers the potential for fresh, home-grown produce.

Despite its peaceful setting, the property is just 5 minutes from La Laguna Estepona's Aldi supermarket and BP petrol station, 10 minutes from the center of Estepona, and 15 minutes from Marbella. This makes it an ideal location for those who value privacy but also want easy access to nearby amenities.

This is a unique opportunity to own a private oasis with all the conveniences just a short drive away.

On the property there is a large, raised water deposit which is fill by well water and has a system to mix in fertilizers for irrigating the trees via the complete irrigation system already installed.

There is a duelling on the property which consists of two bedrooms and a living area. Adjacent is a storeroom for machinery and on the other side of the covered terrace is the bathroom. The built areas need reform but could be made into a lovely farmhouse.

The property is completely fenced and has several gated entrances to access the land at different levels.

This charming two-story townhouse, located in the peaceful area of El Padron in Estepona, offers the perfect combination of comfort and convenience. Situated in a gated community, just a few minutes' drive from Beso Beach/Laguna Beach and various amenities, this property stands out for its south-facing orientation and direct access to the pool from the terrace, making it an ideal choice to enjoy the Mediterranean climate.

The entrance to the house is framed by a lovely porch with a terrace. On the ground floor, the property features a spacious and bright living-dining room, perfect for family gatherings or relaxing moments. The fully equipped kitchen with Bosch appliances integrates seamlessly into the space through a serving hatch, offering functionality and style. From this floor, you can access a private terrace that includes a barbecue area and seating, perfect for enjoying summer evenings outdoors. There is also a guest toilet on the ground floor.
The first floor houses three bedrooms. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and access to a terrace overlooking the community pool. The other two bedrooms share an additional bathroom, providing space and privacy for the whole family.

The property is equipped with solar panels, which contribute to significant savings and energy efficiency. The house also features air conditioning, porcelain floors, and a reinforced door for added security. The community, with mature gardens and a well-maintained pool, offers a tranquil and pleasant environment. Parking is available both within the community, in front of the house, and on the street. Its strategic location allows you to enjoy the tranquility of the area without sacrificing proximity to the beach, shops, and the center of Estepona.

property_description:
Nestled in the heart of the town of Coín, this stunning Andalusian-style townhouse offers a rare blend of traditional charm and spacious living. Located just off a picturesque square, the property boasts authentic architectural details, high ceilings, and multiple outdoor spaces, making it an exceptional opportunity for those seeking a unique home with plenty of potential. Spread over three floors, the home currently features five bedrooms and three bathrooms, with ample space to create additional rooms as needed.

Ground Floor:

-Step into a grand entrance hall that immediately sets the tone with its traditional Andalusian charm.

- A spacious reception area leads to an indoor patio, beautifully adorned with authentic wall tiles, a true highlight of the home.

- To the right, a sitting room (which could easily be converted into a sixth bedroom).

- A large living room with a fireplace, offering plenty of natural light and a warm atmosphere.

- A kitchen located at the back of the patio, with an adjoining utility/storage room housing a large underground water deposit tank.

- A small bathroom and a secondary staircase providing access to the upper floors.

First Floor:

- The marble staircase, open to the top of the house, creates a striking feature as it leads to the bedroom level.

Five bedrooms, including:

- Two double bedrooms

- Two single bedrooms, which could easily be combined into a larger room

- A former library, which has previously been used as a bedroom

- A family bathroom

- The master bedroom stands out with two French patio doors opening onto Juliet balconies, allowing in an abundance of natural light.

This outdoor space is larger than the apartment itself and opens endless possibilities for entertaining, relaxing, or even creating a rooftop garden oasis.

Interior: 75m²

A low-maintenance home, a holiday village escape, or a smart investment property with potential for holiday or long-term rental income.

property_description:
Located in a peaceful rural setting between the charming villages of Casarabonela (5 km) and Pizarra (14 km), this beautifully maintained single-story country home offers the per-fect blend of privacy, comfort, and natural beauty. With Pizarra’s train station providing di-rect access to Málaga, the property is ideally positioned for those seeking countryside tranquility with convenient city connections. Set on a gently sloping, fully fenced plot, the home enjoys panoramic south-facing views over the surrounding hills and dramatic mountain ranges, with sunlight from dawn to dusk. A short drive from the main road leads to this private oasis, where the setting feels wonder-fully secluded without being remote.

One of the standout features is the lovely private pool, complete with Roman steps, perfect for relaxing while taking in the incredible views of the Andalusian countryside.

Inside, the property boasts an open-plan living and dining area with a cozy fireplace, seam-lessly connected to a fully fitted kitchen featuring a Belfast sink and gas hob. A separate snug/lounge off the main living space offers potential for conversion into a third bedroom if desired.

A hallway leads to two spacious double bedrooms. The master suite includes a walk-in dressing area, an en-suite with a generous walk-in shower, and direct access to the garden and terrace. The second bedroom is served by a stylish family bathroom with a bathtub. Air conditioning runs throughout the property, ensuring year-round comfort.

Outside, the mature, well-tended gardens feature a variety of palm trees, succulents, and olive trees, enhancing the Mediterranean charm. There are several shaded and sun-drenched seating areas throughout the garden, ideal for dining, entertaining, or simply en-joying the peace and spectacular views.

Additional features include:

• Mains electricity

• Water delivered (approx. €60 for 6,000L, typically lasting 3–6 weeks, (de-pending on the season as more water is used during the summer months) There is capacity to store a total of 10.000L between 3 storage tanks.

• Ideal as a permanent residence or holiday retreat

This move-in-ready home offers a rare opportunity to enjoy serene countryside living with outstanding views, a beautiful pool, and excellent access to nearby villages and transport links.

One of the most captivating aspects of this property is the uninterrupted, forever-protected view. Surrounded entirely by farmland and agricultural land where no further building is permitted, the scenery is guaranteed to remain untouched, offering a true sense of peace and permanence. The landscape transforms beautifully through the four distinct seasons, from lush green fields in spring to golden tones in summer, rich autumn hues, and the dra-matic charm of winter, providing a breathtaking natural backdrop all year round.

Contact us today for further information or to arrange a viewing.

Lastly, the attic of 27.21 m² is a small room with access to a 10.54 m² terrace-solarium, offering excellent sea and mountain views.

The community is very peaceful, sharing a swimming pool and garden area to enjoy all the tranquillity and privacy with your loved ones.

property_description:
Spacious 3-Bedroom Townhouse with Breathtaking Views – Alhaurín el Grande

Discover this beautifully presented three-bedroom, three-bathroom townhouse set in a tranquil and picturesque location in Alhaurín el Grande, offering stunning views of the mountains and overlooking the ninth hole of Alhaurin golf course. This spacious home offers the perfect blend of comfort, privacy, and natural beauty across three thoughtfully designed levels.

Top Floor Sanctuary
The entire top floor is dedicated to a luxurious master suite that spans the full width of the rear of the property. Once two separate bedrooms, this expansive space now features abundant built-in wardrobes, a private sitting area with TV, and direct access to a sunny terrace with spectacular mountain and golf course views. The ensuite bathroom includes a combined bath and shower.

Also on this floor is a generous second double bedroom, complete with its own ensuite and charming Juliet balcony that overlooks the front of the property.

Main Living Area
Entering at street level, you're greeted by a welcoming hallway and a guest WC. The bright, open-plan living and dining area features large windows framing the breathtaking views. The fully fitted kitchen flows seamlessly into the dining space, making it ideal for entertaining. Step outside onto a lovely terrace, perfect for morning coffee, then follow the steps down to a larger lower-level terrace, surrounded by bougainvillea and honeysuckle – a true haven of peace and beauty.

Spacious Basement Retreat
The lower level is a hidden gem, offering incredible versatility. It includes a separate laundry room, a large storage room with built-in shelving, and a generous open-plan space currently set up as a home office and entertainment area with a built-in bar. This level also houses a third bedroom and a bathroom with an oversized walk-in shower – ideal for guests or even as a self-contained studio. A staircase leads directly from the basement to the outdoor terraces above.

Additional Features:
• Full security shutters and steel security grilles throughout
• Three spacious bathrooms (all ensuite)
• Exceptional storage space across all levels
• Sunken Terrace area at the front of the property for afternoon sun
• Multiple private terraces with lush, mature planting
• Serene golf course and mountain views
• Off street Parking driveway

The Golf Club house offers a great restaurant and bar, with monthly entertainment on the doorstep. Additionally, there is an independent Pilates Studio and a hairdresser's within the urbanization. The BP Garage is a few minutes away, and there are plenty of great local restaurants and the town of Alhaurin el Grande for shopping.

This well-maintained townhouse is ideal for full-time living, a holiday retreat, or an investment rental opportunity.
Don’t miss the chance to make this unique and spacious property your own.

Access to the property is easy and secure, with parking located just above the house and three gated entrances—each operated by code or intercom. Whether you’re welcoming guests or coming home from a day out, you’ll appreciate the thoughtful layout and privacy this home offers. Step inside and you’re greeted by a spacious, airy entrance hall that sets the tone for the rest of the house. To the right, there’s a tastefully modernised kitchen, fully refurbished with contemporary finishes. A guest cloakroom and a handy storage closet are also located just off the hall.
Moving through to the main living area, you'll find an unexpectedly spacious open-plan lounge and dining room. Natural light pours in through wide glass sliding doors, opening onto a generous terrace with stunning views of the mountains and La Motta Torre—a peaceful, private space to enjoy your morning coffee or unwind with a sunset cocktail.
A serving hatch between the kitchen and dining area not only adds character but also makes hosting easy, keeping the space bright and open.
Upstairs, a graceful staircase leads to a wide, open landing and three generously sized bedrooms. The master suite features built-in wardrobes, a modern ensuite bathroom, and a private sun terrace—ideal for relaxing in the morning light. The two additional bedrooms also include fitted wardrobes and share a stylish, recently updated family shower room.
Just a 30-second walk from your front door is the community’s charming pool and sunbathing area. Quiet and rarely crowded, thanks to the small number of homes in the development, it’s a serene oasis perfect for cooling off or soaking up the sun.
This home has been meticulously cared for by its current owners and is in immaculate condition throughout. It's being offered for sale only to accommodate a move to a single-level property, making this a rare opportunity to own a truly turnkey home in a prestigious location.

The fourth apartment, located on the first floor of the property, includes a kitchen-dining room, dining area, double bedroom and a bathroom with bathtub. Finally, the fifth apartment is smaller and has one bedroom and a bathroom.

The exterior areas are shared and include a swimming pool, large barbecue area and garden. In addition, the property has a storage room and a laundry area. The land, completely fenced and flat, has water from a private well and the community irrigation canal.

property_description:
Introducing a charming townhouse located in Puerto Romano, a peaceful residential area situated in El Padrón, to the east of Estepona. The property is just a 5-minute drive from the beach and 10 minutes from the center of Estepona, offering both convenience and privacy in a natural setting.

Built on a 189 m² plot, the property features a spacious outdoor patio from which a staircase leads to the main residence, positioned above street level. The entrance is preceded by a bright, enclosed porch, ideal as an additional dining area or lounge. From this space, you can access the living room with a fireplace on one side, and the independent kitchen on the other, which also connects to the living room through an internal door. Adjacent to the living room, a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom completes this floor, while a spiral staircase leads to the upper level, where the second bedroom is located, also with a private bathroom and access to a large terrace with open and partial sea views.

On the lower floor of the house, with independent side access from the patio, there is a studio with a private bathroom, perfect for guests, family members, or as a workspace, as well as a laundry area and a separate, ventilated storage room. Although the property is in good condition and perfectly habitable, it allows for some aesthetic updates to modernize, improve, and adapt it to personal preferences.

The house is equipped with individual air conditioning units in several rooms and solar panels. While it does not have a garage, it is located on a private street with little traffic, making parking easy. Its proximity to the sea, the beach, and the town center, as well as its tranquil atmosphere, make this property a very attractive option both as a permanent residence and for getaways to the Costa del Sol.
